text: Tbh nothing is as pure and soul lifting as reading Dua-e-Kumail every thursday and it hits really different in ramadan days Wallahi so beautiful🥺🤍 #Ramadan  #دعاء_كميل #شب_جمعه #شب_قدر https://t.co/mi1b2WdOC6

text: If you feel Ramadan is passing by so quickly it’s a sign that you’re enjoying it and benefiting from it, because time drags when you’re suffering.  #Ramadan
